attires.name: Phoenix Crown (Fengguan)
attires.description: A traditional ceremonial headdress for women, most notably worn by brides. It is adorned with phoenixes, dragons, and other intricate designs.

attires.name: Guan
attires.description: A general term for a variety of traditional Chinese hats or caps, often worn by scholars and officials in ancient times.

attires.name: Mianfu Crown
attires.description: A ceremonial crown worn by Chinese emperors and kings, featuring a flat top board with strings of jade beads.
